channel.title: Pleaseeee begging for help!
channel.description:
so hey i guys i got windows 7 and i have a torvapkz v2 source with client i opened port on firewall,utorrent and my modem and i still cant connect using the no-ip when i try to log in server it says "no response from the server please try a different world" i also tried many diffrent sources and still no hope :S:S please help me guys i want to put my server online i can only play it using 192.168--- or 127.0.0.1 please if some1 can use teamviewer with me i appreciate it
my id on teamviewer :674 275 255 password:6607
thanks :D

item.title: Pleaseeee begging for help!
item.dc:creator: @Apollo_man Apollo man
item.description:
@Apollo_man wrote:

Well i indeed have been able to get my server up, only after switching my ISP.

Please make sure that your ISP (Internet Service Provider) will actually allow you to forward ports through your modem (I’m assuming you have a router which you forward the ports in).

I use to have satillite internet, and tried every single type of hosting method, to no avail.

This could very well be the problem. My suggestion is to search for your ISP’s support site, or a forum on the subject of you’re ISP. Then check to see if your actually aloud to forward ports with them

That’s all i can come up with.

Read full topic
